p: When present, most invasive species were not abundant, with a median cover class of 2 (1â€“10% cover, classified as low invasive species abundance) for both R. multiflora and B. thunbergii ( Fig 4). Most plots were in cover class 1 or 2 (70% of plots for R. multiflora, 76% for B. thunbergii), and very few had abundance over 50% cover (3.5% of plots for R. multiflora, 1.6% for B. thunbergii).
